price: Nëse duam, Ne e bëjmë atë të njelmët, andaj përse nuk jeni mirënjohës?!
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
